name: Pistacchio's Many Forms
description:
A poor little pistachio plant named Pistacche has outgrown his pot. He must embark on a perilous journey through town to find an open vessel. There are rumors of the famed Jupiter Pot, the largest pot in the universe.

Will he find peace? (And soil?)

CONTROLS

A, D = Left and right

SPACE = Jump

E = Shoot (if you have the right pot)

CREDITS

I made this game in 10 days for GBJam! It was an amazing experience and I'm so glad I could participate.

I really wish I could have had time to add sound FX. All in all I am proud of it, my wife said it's her favorite game I've made this year...ha! The setting was inspired by a recent trip to Italy. I hope you enjoy it.

And THANK YOU...THE PLAYER!
